summary.para: Contains information about a power request. This structure is used by the and functions.

remarks.para: It is safe to pass read-only strings as the SimpleReasonString or ReasonStrings because the and functions read from the strings and do not write to them.

summary.para: The version number of the structure. This parameter must be set to POWER_REQUEST_CONTEXT_VERSION.
The format of the reason for the power request. This parameter can be one of the following values:

description.para: The Detailed structure identifies a localizable string resource that describes the reason for the power request.
The SimpleReasonString parameter contains a simple, non-localizable string that describes the reason for the power request.

summary.para: A union that consists of either a Detailed structure or a string.
A structure that identifies a localizable string resource to describe the reason for the power request.
The module that contains the string resource.
The ID of the string resource.
The number of strings in the ReasonStrings parameter.
An array of strings to be substituted in the string resource at run time.
A non-localized string that describes the reason for the power request.
